thread.section_title: Radisson Martinique on Broadway - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Late Lunch
thread.title_full: Late Lunch - Review of Radisson Martinique on Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Michael H
title: Late Lunch
text:
Missed lunch and was caught hungry but to far out from dinner so opted for an appetiser at the Hotels Cafe.
Went for the chicken wings which to be honest was more like a main course perfect balance of spice and sweet with a mild blue cheese sauce, ciabatta bread with olive rounded out the snack.
Staff friendly and attentive and it hasn't lost its edge since my last visit.
